HOME.HAPPY: We are happy to have you here!
HOME.BUT: But first you need to validate your email to use your account
HOME.SENT-EMAIL: We've sent you an email with the verification link. Just go there and you'll be able to login
HOME.SENT-2: The verification email has been resent to your email!
HOME.GO-TO-EMAIL: Go to your email and verify it!

ORDERS.ARE-YOU-SURE: Are you sure you want to delete this supplier?

RECIPE.CREATE: Create your recipes based on registered dishes
RECIPE.ARE-YOU-SURE: Are you sure you want to delete this recipe?

TEAM.SEL-ROLE: Select a role for your invitation
TEAM.SHARE: Share this code with the person you want to invite to your team.
TEAM.EXP: This code will expire on 24 hours
TEAM.ARE-YOU-SURE: Are you sure you want to drop this user from your team?
TEAM.THIS-ACTION: This action will delete this users account

RECAPTCHA.GREAT: It's great you decided to start!
RECAPTCHA.BUT-FIRST: But first we need to verify that you're human!

FORGOT.ANOTHER-LINK: You've changed your password successfully! You will be redirected to the home page
FORGOT.REQ-NOT-FOUND: We didn't find any request to change your password. Maybe it expired. Request another link to change your password
FORGOT.REDIRECTION: You will be redirected to the home page
FORGOT.INTRODUCE-EMAIL: Introduce your email and we'll send you a link to change your passsword
FORGOT.CORRECTLY-SENT: The email has been correctly sent. Change your password using the link we provided

DISHES.START: Start adding ingredients to the dish! Use the search bar to find the ingredients for this dish.
DISHES.REMEMBER: Remember! You need to have registered ingredients in order to create your dish.
DISHES.NAME: Name
DISHES.NAME-CATEGORY: Set a name and a category to the dish
DISHES.EMPTY-COLLECTION: Woops! We don't have any dishes to display. Don't be shy and start adding your menu!
DISHES.CREATE: Create your dishes here. Set a name and category for your new dish and start adding ingredients with the search bar.
DISHES.CREATOR: Dish Creator

INGREDIENTS.EXPLANATION: How does the Product Manager work?
INGREDIENTS.TEXT-1: Choose between the available tabs to see your registered products and categories.
INGREDIENTS.TEXT-2: You can add, edit or remove products and categories from their respective tab.
INGREDIENTS.EMPTY: It looks like you don't have any registered products. Start adding products to your account. You'll need to have registered categories.
INGREDIENTS.NAME: Name
INGREDIENTS.EMPTY-CATEGORIES: It looks like you don't have any registered categories! Start adding categories to your account.
INGREDIENTS.LOSS-REQUIRED: Ingredient waste per kilo is required!
INGREDIENTS.ARE-YOU-SURE: Are you sure you want to delete?
INGREDIENTS.ARE-YOU-SURE-2: Are you sure you want to edit?
INGREDIENTS.BE-CAREFULL: Be really careful! If you delete this category the products within this category will be deleted!
INGREDIENTS.BE-CAREFULL-ING: Be careful! If you delete this product it will disappear from every dish which contains it!

AUTH.VALID-EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address
AUTH.PWD-REQ: At least one number, min length of 8 characters
AUTH.NAME: Name
AUTH.UNKNOWN-RESTAURANT: We still don't have your restaurant data
AUTH.LOGOUT-MSG: You will be logged out. Use your new password to login
AUTH.LOGOUT-MSG-2: If you had any problems during this process please contact with some admin.
AUTH.ARE-YOU-SURE: Are you sure you want to delete the account??
